name: Final Frontier (itch) (TonyStark1414)
description:
You are the captain of the USS Industry. Your mission is to take down the hostile starbase in the territory of the United Galactic Administration. You will pilot your ship through asteroid fields, fight enemy ships and navigate a black hole. Use arrow keys to move. If you take a hit when your shields are down, your ship will be destroyed. Good luck.

DEVELOPER NOTE: I know the menu buttons look terrible. Go off the tiny ones. Unity is a jerk. Also, I don't recommend playing in full volume.
